short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily track your TODO list, tasks you are working on now, and stuff that's already done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Agile Tasks & Project Management app, was developed for focused and determined people who seek to have an efficient control over their activities without making this process excessively bureaucratic, with it you can perform the management of your daily activities in a quick and practical way.
